keyPolicies.policyDescription: Calls for tax fairness, protection of pension pot, mansion tax to fund NHS, and opposes 'SNP's plan for more austerity'.
Intends to use funds from a mansion tax to hire more nurses and general practitioners.
Support for younger people with a proposal to provide a guaranteed apprenticeship for 18 and 19-year-olds and opposes tuition fees for university.

issues.economy: Calls for tax fairness, pledges to protect pension pot and proposes a mansion tax to fund NHS.
issues.education: Opposes tuition fees, supports younger generation with apprenticeships.
issues.health: Pledges to hire 1,000 more nurses in Scotland and guarantee a GP appointment within 48 hours.

housing.content: Using funds from mansion tax to tackle chronic housing issues.

leaflet.personalStatement: Michael believes that the next generation will achieve more than his family has and that there should be no limit on their ambitions.

images.caption: Image of Michael McCann with his family and a dog, expressing family values.
Image of Michael McCann visiting healthcare professionals, emphasizing his support for the NHS.
Image of Michael McCann with younger people, highlighting his focus on the next generation.
